name: Standing Man
description:
Only button you will use in the game is Spacebar (except R for restart and Esc for quit :)

Your goal is to stand as long as you can. For standing, you must press Spacebar as repeatedly as the game requires. You can see how many presses you will need to stand from the top-left corner.

(The game is done for "One Button Jam" https://itch.io/jam/one-button-to-rule-all-jam)

(The game is done 3 years after #gezipark events in Turkey. It was a long time waited and wanted game idea for me. I am very happy that I've finally done it.)
